remarks: The logarithm of the product of two positive real numbers is the sum of logarithms.  Property 2 of [Cohen4] p. 361.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Sep-2014.)  (Revised by AV, 29-May-2020.)
statement: relogbmul $p |- ( ( B e. ( CC \ { 0 , 1 } ) /\ ( A e. RR+ /\ C e. RR+ ) ) -> ( B logb ( A x. C ) ) = ( ( B logb A ) + ( B logb C ) ) ) $.
